short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you save your favorite webpages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open your lisht with every new tab. Easily add new lisht items by filling out the forms. If you want to add the website your are currently visiting to your lisht, just click the lisht extension icon. Use the options page (chrome://extensions) to select your favorite color theme. Have fun!

Improve this extension on GitHub: https://github.com/Fischaela/lisht
